summary: "Dredd" (2012) is a sci-fi action movie about a powerful law enforcer, Judge Dredd, played by Karl Urban, who must bring order to a chaotic 200-story apartment block in a dystopian city called Mega-City One. He's joined by a rookie partner, Judge Anderson (Olivia Thirlby), and they battle a drug lord, Ma-Ma (Lena Headey). The film is based on the "Judge Dredd" comic and was directed by Pete Travis with a script by Alex Garland. Though it received positive reviews for its effects and action, it was criticized for its violence and lack of satire. Despite decent reviews, the film didn't make enough money for a guaranteed sequel.
title: Dredd
